title: 'Easy as 1, 2, Pee' — Withings' smart scanner puts a urology lab in your toilet bowl
author: Conor Hale
description: To those who've always wanted to digitally monitor their bathroom health at home: you're in luck. | To those who've always wanted to digitally monitor their bathroom health at home: you're in luck.
